server

Class Breadcrumb

  • java.lang.Object
    • server.Breadcrumb

  • public class Breadcrumb
extends Object
    Manages breadcrumb data, for displaying the breadcrumb navigation in the MUBox folder view.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      boolean active 
      String href 
      String name

      static org.json.simple.JSONArray getBreadcrumbsAsJSON(String fullPath)
      Gets JSON array of breadcrumbs for a given path.

      Creates a JSONObject with 3 fields: href, name, active.

      • Breadcrumb

        public Breadcrumb(String href,
          String name,
          boolean active)
        Constructs an instance of Breadcrumb with parameters
        Parameters:
        href - Hyperlink to a given breadcrumb item
        name - Name of the given breadcrumb item
        active - True if the given breadcrumb item is selected (active).

      • getBreadcrumbs

        public static Breadcrumb[] getBreadcrumbs(String fullPath)
        Transforms the full path to a folder into an array of breadcrumb objects to be used with Bootstrap assumes that fullPath starts with '/', e.g. "/a/b/c" or "/"
        Parameters:
        fullPath - Full path
        Returns:
        An array of Breadcrumb.

        Returns:
